org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class RegistrationNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.RegistrationNotification

  • public class RegistrationNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Notification that a blade has registered/unregistered.
